description.english: Earn 500 Glory Points and talk to the oracles in the Hunter's Guild
Reach exalted reputation with both east and west Oscilia
Unlock the entrance to the Secret Storage in Rulah
Dance to enter the Ivory Spider Hideout in Nubila
Open the entrance to Sileas around Folaghzdourad
Find the 8 ghosts in Iughafumak to open the Forobuyo
Conquer Dohnor Arena without taking damage
Reach Incuboza by traversing the Mumir Forest
Gain access to Laris de Mahr
Talk to Gobkol with all bosses defeated
Obtain a perfect score of 10 in the joust mini game
Hear all the Karthgad's bear songs
Defeat the Shame of Embarrasment without taking damage
Defeat the Shame of Dismay without taking damage
Defeat the Shame of Arrogance without taking damage
Defeat the Shame of Hubris without taking damage
Defeat the Shame of Indifference without taking damage
Defeat the Shame of Avarice without taking damage
Defeat the Shame of Resentment without taking damage
Defeat the Shame of Cowardice without taking damage
Defeat the Shame of Guilt without taking damage
Find and defeat Psy Tiki using the wells around Glorianta
Face one of the dormant gods
